sid.description: The unique identifier for the call.

date_created.description: The date and time when the call record was created.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the call record was last updated.

parent_call_sid.description: The SID of the parent call if this call is part of a conference.

account_sid.description: The unique identifier for the account associated with the call.

to.description: The phone number that received the call.

to_formatted.description: The formatted version of the 'to' phone number.

from.description: The phone number that made the call.

from_formatted.description: The formatted version of the 'from' phone number.

phone_number_sid.description: The SID of the phone number used for the call.

status.description: The current status of the call, such as 'completed' or 'in-progress'.

start_time.description: The date and time when the call started.

end_time.description: The date and time when the call ended.

duration.description: The duration of the call in seconds.

price_unit.description: The currency unit of the call cost.

direction.description: The direction of the call, either 'inbound' or 'outbound'.

answered_by.description: The name of the entity or system that answered the call.

annotation.description: Any additional notes or context added to the call.

api_version.description: The version of the Twilio API used for this call.

forwarded_from.description: The phone number that initiated the call forwarding.

group_sid.description: The unique identifier of the call group to which this call belongs.

caller_name.description: The name of the caller as supplied by the caller ID service.

queue_time.description: The time the call spent in a queue before being answered.

trunk_sid.description: The unique identifier of the trunk used for the call.

uri.description: The URI for this call record.

subresource_uris.description: Contains URIs for related subresources such as recordings or notifications.

recordings.description: URI for call recordings related to this call.

notifications.description: URI for call notifications related to this call.

feedback.description: URI for call feedback related to this call.

payments.description: URI for call payments related to this call.

siprec.description: URI for call SIP recording related to this call.

events.description: URI for call events related to this call.

feedback_summaries.description: URI for call feedback summaries related to this call.

streams.description: URI for call streams related to this call.

user_defined_message_subscriptions.description: URI for user-defined message subscriptions related to this call.

user_defined_messages.description: URI for user-defined messages related to this call.
